titles.title: A bill to require the imposition of sanctions with respect to Nord Stream 2 AG pursuant to the Countering America's Adversaries Through Sanctions Act.
A bill to require the imposition of sanctions with respect to Nord Stream 2 AG pursuant to the Countering America's Adversaries Through Sanctions Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This bill requires the President to impose property-blocking sanctions with respect to Nord Stream 2 AG. (Nord Stream 2 AG is the entity that operates Nord Stream 2, a pipeline designed to carry natural gas exports from Russia to Germany.)
